desc: Handmade hair accessories for every style. All of our headbands are made from low-waste fabrics with individually crafted patterns & prints by small artists like us!

layout.text: Handmade, Small Batch, Bohemian Style Hair Accessories
Every year, 85% of textiles made for the fashion industry is sent to the dump. We envision a world where sustainability and fashion go hand-in-hand, while supporting small artists along the way.
